citeseerx_summary.title: The demographics of web search
citeseerx_summary.abstract: – users – queries – search engines Web – today, there are more than 130 million Web servers – Web is the largest data repository (estimated as 100 billion pages) – well-connected graph with out- and in-link power law distributions Users – culturally and educationally diverse – little patience (few queries posed & few answers seen)
